result.title: Codeforces Short 3
result.content:
Codeforces Short 3 will be held on 23-2-2016 20:00 Malaysian Time.

The contest will be just like other Codeforces Short contest (lasts for 2 hours, 5 problems, Div.2 level).

As usual, most of the problems aren't original. This means that it might be possible that you have seen some of the problems before. The contest will follow extended ACM-ICPC rules like any other gym contest on Codeforces.
